title: The year journalism stops outsourcing its independence
description: Journalism tends to treat technology as something that happened to it, like an asteroid. In 2026, that stance will become untenable. Governments are beginning to understand that their reliance on Silicon Valley technology is a liability. Jurisdictions like the European Union are funding alternative ecosystems where software is developed in accordance with their values: respectful...
